entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
